com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop

Interface ProceedingJoinPoint

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JoinPoint
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicProceedingJoinPoint

    public interface ProceedingJoinPoint
extends JoinPoint

    Provides support for around advice by exposing the proceed() method.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 07/14/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

      • proceed

        java.lang.Object proceed()
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Proceed with the next advice or target method invocation.
        Returns:
        the value returned by the target method, if any
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the next advice or target method threw an exception
